concept.title: Distinctive Ringtones
concept.shortdesc: TA1600/2400/3200 provides 10 configurable distinctive ringtones. You can configure different ringtones to match different incoming caller ID.

example.p: If Inbound Caller Pattern is configured as 100., all the incoming calls start with digits 100 will ring using cadence 2000,4000 as the following figure shows.
